metadata.title: rubygem-uri: ReDoS vulnerability - upstream's incomplete fix for CVE-2023-28755 (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in the rubygem URI. The URI parser mishandles invalid URLs that have specific characters, which causes an increase in execution time parsing strings to URI objects. This issue may result in a regular expression denial of service (ReDoS). 
            STATEMENT: This vulnerability exists due to an incomplete fix for CVE-2023-28755 in upstream.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
puppet-agent is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
